about_the_game: This is a full suite of editing tools that allows players to create their own maps and mods for the game. If you'd like to know more and talk about the Depth Editor join us on our Steam Forums – Mapping and Modding subforum. We can't wait to sink our teeth into what you guys release.
detailed_description: This is a full suite of editing tools that allows players to create their own maps and mods for the game. If you'd like to know more and talk about the Depth Editor join us on our Steam Forums – Mapping and Modding subforum. We can't wait to sink our teeth into what you guys release.
legal_notice: Depth © 2009-2021 by Digital Confectioners, Ltd. All rights reserved.
name: Depth - SDK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista 64-bit and above
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 2.6 GHz (dual-core required)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista 64-bit and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 7870/R9 270 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti/760
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Card

short_description: This is a full suite of editing tools that allows players to create their own maps and mods for the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Polish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
